name: Better on Paper: First Draft
description:
Controls: 

-W / Up Arrow: Jump or Go Up (Jetpack)

-AD / Left & Right Arrow: Walk Left and Right or Fly Left and Right (Jetpack)

-S / Down Arrow: Slide or Hide in and Exit Manhole

-Space / Enter: Shoot Gun or Punch

-E or . [Period]: Place Bomb (When Bombs are On)

-Q or , [Comma]: Reset Player

-Minus: Settings Menu

1: Exit Minigame

C: Credits

Player 1 can be controlled with a controller. 

Controls: 

-Up on Joystick or D-Pad or A: Jump or Go Up (Jetpack)

-Left and Right on Joystick or D-Pad: Walk Left and Right or Fly Left and Right (Jetpack)

-Down on Joystick or D-Pad: Slide or Hide in and Exit Manhole

-X or Y: Shoot Gun or Punch

-B: Place Bomb (When Bombs are On)

-Minus: Reset Player
